channel.title: Need help with DeltaScape run.bat
channel.description:
Basically I compiled the server with no errors, I then tried to run the server. A command prompt box appears saying "DeltaScape" after that the box floods with the word "null". I have no idea how to fix this and this is what is in the bat file at the moment if it helps: [code]@echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
My java is jre1.6.0_07 and i am running jdk1.6.0_10

item.title: Need help with DeltaScape run.bat
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It’s the anti-leech. Remove it or get out. Simple as that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with DeltaScape run.bat

item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:2, topic:256348”]The Null is the anti leech in Delta’s server.
Just download a Delta Base server which you like, and it wont null ;)[/quote]
^Or your could fix the antileech^
